overview: We reached into the dark recesses of Sunny's mind and found five scorching hot scenes she always imagined, and longed to re-create. So hot, she squirted! And so did Brea Lynn! See the anal everyone's talking about. See three of Vivid's hottest girls! See the kind of sex only B. Skow delivers, and every critic is saluting! See The Sunny Experiment!
tagline: From The Mind of Sunny Leone...
title: The Sunny Experiment
